column1: Smoque BBQ////We ordered the St. Louis ribs with 2 sides and the Half-Half Sandwich. Perhaps it was when we went (late afternoon)
column2: but the brisket (chopped only) was dry and the ribs was not as tender. The sides (fries
column3: BBQ beans and Mac and Cheese) was good
column4: but I can't distinguish between gourmet Mac and Cheese and Kraft's.
